title: The Normal neonate (TEFC)
creator_credit: George Pashuk and University of New South Wales. Tertiary Education Research Centre
brief_description: Examination of a normal infant by a leading paediatrician. It encompasses the six stages of consciousness, the senses of sight and hearing, gross motor functions, and the primitive reflexes.
creator_credit_for_label: George Pashuk and University of New South Wales. Tertiary Education Research Centre
